Title: The Crescent Moon
Writer: Kil-soo Chang, Eun-a Cho, Chae-bong Jeong (story), Ji-hyung Yoo
Actors: Ju-bong Gi, Ye-rin Han, Seo-hee Jang, Bu-ja Kang
Plot: (Korean with English subtitles) Shelved for three years before it made its way to the international festivals, The Crescent Moon is director Chang Kil-soo's tender masterpiece about Nan-na,...
